articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: 1 in 3 parents say family holiday gatherings worth the risk of Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: A third of parents in a new poll published Monday said gathering the family for Thanksgiving is worth the risk of catching or spreading Covid-19.
